      • isTabClosable

        protected boolean isTabClosable​(java.lang.String title,
                                javax.swing.Icon icon,
                                java.awt.Component component,
                                java.lang.String tip,
                                int index)
        Override this method to control which tabs will have a close button added. It will be called when the tab is first added to the pane.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the tested tab
        icon - the icon of the tested tab
        component - the cxontents of the tested tab
        tip - the tool tip text of the tested tab
        index - the index of the tested tab
        Returns:
        true if the tab should be closable

      • closeTab

        public void closeTab​(int index)
        Close a tab without firing an event, as long as isTabClosable(java.lang.String, javax.swing.Icon, java.awt.Component, java.lang.String, int) returns true. This allows you to close a tab voluntarily in response to a tab closing event.
        Parameters:
        index - the tab to close
